Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.components

Class MiniBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.components.MiniBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class MiniBoard extends Object implements Component
Represents a component for displaying a miniaturized board view in the TUI. Implements the Component interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • MiniBoard

      public MiniBoard(String username, ClientInterface client)
      Constructs a MiniBoard object with the specified username and client interface.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the mini board.
      client - The client interface used to retrieve opponent data and rotate the board.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Retrieves the username associated with the mini board.
      Returns:
      The username associated with the mini board.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(Map<Coordinates,Integer> board)
      Sets the board configuration to be displayed based on the provided board data. Rotates the board using RotateBoard and prepares it for printing.
      Parameters:
      board - The board configuration represented as a map of coordinates to card IDs.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the MiniBoard object to its string representation. The string representation includes the formatted display of the mini board and the username colored according to the player's color.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of the MiniBoard object.
